description: A frontline warrior who can withstand heavy attacks and cut down multiple enemies at once. The anchor of any team.
A master archer who rains death from afar. Her arrows can stun enemies or hit multiple targets simultaneously.
A spiritual warrior who can revive fallen allies and summon spirit animals. Essential for survival in nightmare difficulties.
A shadow warrior who deals massive damage to single targets and can vanish from sight. Strikes fear into the Oni.
